scripts.say: Portland, since we've started the mission, you've looked at Indianapolis's photo 105 times and sighed 115 times...
She's just out on another mission, and that much is enough to send you spiralling down into despair?
But Indy is just thaaat cute! Atlanta, you're also a big sister, right? Don't you also know about the cuteness of little sisters?
Cuteness is of no concern to me. In the first place, one is a dork and the other is a crybaby...
But I suppose I'll admit, they're both cute...
You see? Don't you feel lonely when you can't be with them?
Dunno. I actually like being able to hear myself think when San Diego isn't orbiting around me.
Of course, I'd prefer to be with them, but there's no getting around the fact that everyone has a job to do.
And that job is to protect the home that everyone can reunite to.
Hehe, in order to protect Indy, I won't be harmed by anything! Even if I do get hurt, I'd still claw my way to her side!
If there's one thing I can count on, it's your unhealthy obsession with your sister... Jeez, compared to you, I can't even consider myself a big sister...
... Ryuujou is a decoy, and the real attack from Shoukaku and Zuikaku is coming!
My anti-air capabilities are quite strong, so I'll head back to support Saratoga. Portland, take the others and continue on.
No, Saratoga said that she and Enterprise will be able to handle it, and that your abilities will be needed here.
I see... got it. Let's move forward then!
